description:
A sports bra meets PFD, the Rebel is built on a shorter chassis and a racerback for full range of motion for women paddlers. The fit system incorporates removable foam pads for all-day support and comfort on the water. In a collaboration with MEC, this version of the Rebel uses PVC-free foam in its pads.

  • PVC-free MEC exclusive uses foam with a reduced footprint
  • 420-denier nylon ripstop is lightweight, quick-drying and durable
  • Adjust-A-Bust fit system with removable underbust memory foam pads mimics support and comfort of a sports bra
  • Padded neoprene shoulders
  • Front zipper with 6 points of adjustment fits comfortably and securely
  • Fleece-lined zippered handwarmer pockets
  • Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard
name: Mustang Survival Rebel Harmonized Foam Front Zip PFD - Women's
